channel.title: CVE Feed for Microsoft Corporation -- Microsoft Exchange Server 2016
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Microsoft Corporation -- Microsoft Exchange Server 2016

item.title: CVE-2017-8758|2024-08-05T16:48:21.641Z -- microsoft%20corporation -- microsoft%20exchange%20server%202016
item.description: Microsoft Exchange Server 2016 allows an elevation of privilege vulnerability when Microsoft Exchange Outlook Web Access (OWA) fails to properly handle web requests, aka "Microsoft Exchange Cross-Site Scripting Vulnerability."
